mapper.select: select count(*) comments from board_comment where board_id in (select id from board where writer = #{userid}) and notify = 0
mapper.update: update board_comment set notify = 1 where notify = 0 and board_id in ( select id from board where writer = #{userid} )
mapper.select: select c.*, name from board_comment c inner join member on writer = userid where notify = 0 and board_id in ( select id from board where writer = #{userid} ) order by writedate desc
